00052     class _OgreExport ConfigFile
00053     {
00054     public:
00055 
00056         ConfigFile();

00073         String getSetting(const String& key, const String& section = StringUtil::BLANK) const;
00075         StringVector getMultiSetting(const String& key, const String& section = StringUtil::BLANK) const;
00076 
00077         typedef std::multimap<String, String> SettingsMultiMap;
00078         typedef MapIterator<SettingsMultiMap> SettingsIterator;
